help-file.title: "SONG OF HARMONY"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Room Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: N/A Duration: Instantaneous/Depends Type of song: Generic
The Bard's Song of Discord rings through the air in waves, causing physical damage to all those of 'evil' in its path. It will affect all creatures of evil, but be they friend or foe so be warned!
